articles.title: American Heart Association proposes adding kidney disease to heart risk - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
New York, Oct 9 (IANS): The American Heart Association (AHA) on Monday for the first time proposed adding kidney disease as a risk factor for Cardiovascular Disease (CVD).
Various aspects of CVD that overlap with kidney disease, Type 2 diabetes and obesity s…

articles.author: Matthew Robert Bennett, Sally Christine Reynolds
articles.title: Humans got to America 7,000 years earlier than thought, new research confirms - Phys.org
articles.description: When and how humans first settled in the Americas is a subject of considerable controversy. In the 20th century, archaeologists believed that humans reached the North American interior no earlier than around 14,000 years ago.
